Name: Power Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Psychic-type moves from damaging Fighting-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Fighting-type Pokémon.  You can get a Power Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: an Orange Silk, a Courage Dust, and a Fight Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
